mapper.insert: insert into JH_Auth_Branch (DEPT_CODE, DEPE_NAME, DEPT_SHORT, DEPT_DESC, DEPT_ROOT, BRANCH_LEVEL, REMARK1, REMARK2, BRANCH_LEADER, WXBM_CODE, TXLQX, ROLE_QX, IS_HAS_QX, ROOM_CODE, COM_ID, DEL_FLG, UP_USER, UP_DATE, CR_USER, CR_DATE) values (#{deptCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{depeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptShort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deptDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptRoot,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{branchLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{branchLeader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wxbmCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{txlqx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleQx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isHasQx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{upUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{crUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update JH_Auth_Branch set DEPE_NAME = #{depeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPT_SHORT = #{deptShort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEPT_DESC = #{deptDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPT_ROOT = #{deptRoot,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BRANCH_LEVEL = #{branchLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REMARK1 = #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK2 = #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BRANCH_LEADER = #{branchLeader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WXBM_CODE = #{wxbmCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TXLQX = #{txlqx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROLE_QX = #{roleQx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_HAS_QX = #{isHasQx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROOM_CODE = #{roomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COM_ID = #{comId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEL_FLG = #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, UP_USER = #{upUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UP_DATE = #{upDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CR_USER = #{crUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CR_DATE = #{crDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select DEPT_CODE, DEPE_NAME, DEPT_SHORT, DEPT_DESC, DEPT_ROOT, BRANCH_LEVEL, REMARK1, REMARK2, BRANCH_LEADER, WXBM_CODE, TXLQX, ROLE_QX, IS_HAS_QX, ROOM_CODE, COM_ID, DEL_FLG, UP_USER, UP_DATE, CR_USER, CR_DATE from JH_Auth_Branch where DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select DEPT_CODE, DEPE_NAME, DEPT_SHORT, DEPT_DESC, DEPT_ROOT, BRANCH_LEVEL, REMARK1, REMARK2, BRANCH_LEADER, WXBM_CODE, TXLQX, ROLE_QX, IS_HAS_QX, ROOM_CODE, COM_ID, DEL_FLG, UP_USER, UP_DATE, CR_USER, CR_DATE from JH_Auth_Branch
